description:
16.13 zoneplate
Generate a zoneplate test video pattern.

This source accepts the following options:
name: zoneplate

options.description: Set frame size. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is "320x240".
options.name: size

options.description: Set frame rate, expressed as number of frames per second. Default value is "25".
options.name: rate

options.description:
Set the duration of the sourced video. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax.

If not specified, or the expressed duration is negative, the video is supposed to be generated forever.
options.name: duration

options.description: Set the sample aspect ratio of the sourced video.
options.name: sar

options.description: Set precision in bits for look-up table for sine calculations. Default value is 10. Allowed range is from 4 to 16.
options.name: precision

options.description: Set horizontal axis offset for output signal. Default value is 0.
options.name: xo

options.description: Set vertical axis offset for output signal. Default value is 0.
options.name: yo

options.description: Set time axis offset for output signal. Default value is 0.
options.name: to

options.description: Set 0-order, constant added to signal phase. Default value is 0.
options.name: k0

options.description: Set 1-order, phase factor multiplier for horizontal axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kx

options.description: Set 1-order, phase factor multiplier for vertical axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: ky

options.description: Set 1-order, phase factor multiplier for time axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kt

options.description: Set phase factor multipliers for combination of spatial and temporal axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kxt

options.description: Set phase factor multipliers for combination of spatial and temporal axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kyt

options.description: Set phase factor multipliers for combination of spatial and temporal axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kxy

options.description: Set 2-order, phase factor multiplier for horizontal axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kx2

options.description: Set 2-order, phase factor multiplier for vertical axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: ky2

options.description: Set 2-order, phase factor multiplier for time axis. Default value is 0.
options.name: kt2

options.description: Set the constant added to final phase to produce chroma-blue component of signal. Default value is 0.
options.name: ku

options.description: Set the constant added to final phase to produce chroma-red component of signal. Default value is 0.
options.name: kv
